LanguageData.VGE_LandmarkSpotted.label: landmark spotted
LanguageData.VGE_LandmarkSpotted.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, your crew noticed unusual location in the surrounding area. Their curiosity might lead to valuable discoveries. {LANDMARK} has been spotted nearby.
LanguageData.VGE_RichDepositDetected.label: rich deposit detected
LanguageData.VGE_RichDepositDetected.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, automated sensors picked up strong readings of rare and valuable resources deep beneath the surface.
LanguageData.VGE_CaravanEncounter.label: caravan encounter
LanguageData.VGE_CaravanEncounter.letterText: While landing {GRAVSHIP}, a nearby travelling caravan noticed the ship and approached out of curiosity. They're looking to trade.
LanguageData.VGE_PerfectTrajectory.label: perfect trajectory
LanguageData.VGE_PerfectTrajectory.letterText: During the launch of {GRAVSHIP}, {PILOT} executed a flawless flight path calculation, ensuring the ship wasted no motion on its journey. The precise maneuvering drastically reduced fuel usage.
LanguageData.VGE_AsteroidDiscovery.label: asteroid discovery
LanguageData.VGE_AsteroidDiscovery.letterText: While traveling, {GRAVSHIP}'s sensors picked up a drifting asteroid rich in valuable materials.
LanguageData.VGE_CrewEuphoria.label: crew euphoria
LanguageData.VGE_CrewEuphoria.letterText: The launch of {GRAVSHIP} was so smooth that it left the crew in high spirits. Laughter and celebration echo through the ship's corridors.
LanguageData.VGE_GravframeHarmony.label: gravframe harmony
LanguageData.VGE_GravframeHarmony.letterText: {GRAVSHIP}’s structural frame experienced minimal stress during launch. The gravfield alignment was perfect, placing no extra strain on the ship’s components.
